channel.title: Adding Silab Items To Shops?
channel.description:
Alright.
This Shouldn't Be A Problem. But It Seems That It Is.
If I Add One Item To A Shop, Thats Silabsoft, I Get An Error In My Compiler, Which Ofcourse, Doesn't Give Me Any Information Of Whats Wrong, And Where To Fix it.
Obviously, its becuase the item number is to high, and there is some thing that i didn't add. BUT, i am pretty sure i have changed all 7500's 9999's and 10000's to 20000, but if i havn't could some one please tell me which line controls what item ID's are accepted into shops?
thanks if ya can.
-Liam[br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2007, 03:18:07 PM[/size][hr]alright, heres the error: [code]Starting KittyScape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 1154 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)[/code]
and yes, i did all of the shophandler stuff in my client.java..
:l
-Liam[br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2007, 03:26:03 PM[/size][hr]sorry for triple posting, but if i can finish this, that will be the last thing to do on my server, khasck revolution, which is a 70% no lagg server, with great stuff like gnome gliders.. :]] this is one of the last things i need to do, before releasing it to the public. so please, help much?
-Liam

item.title: Adding Silab Items To Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Liam1 Liam-
item.description:
@Liam1 wrote:

thanks aftereffect, if you like, you always have a spot at admin on my server, whenever i open it.

its working now btw,

-Liam
